resources.string: We care about you and your baby\'s personal data.
The images you provide will only be used for this project, will be stored anonymously and will be destroyed afterwards.
For more information about our privacy policy and terms of use, please visit out website.
Click below to accept the terms and conditions
By donating the images of your baby the University of Nottingham will create a mobile phone app that will allow doctors to estimate if a baby was born prematurely in places without ultrasound scans.
BabyFace collects images of your baby to help those in need.
The was a problem communicating with the camera

The data collected will be used to create software able to estimate the gestational age of babies. Gestational age can be estimated by looking at the number of wrinkles in babies\' feet and the shape of their ears.
Estimating the correct gestational age of a premature baby can save their lives by allowing doctors to choose appropriate treatments.
